typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		Breed as string,
		HeightCm as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Horses
Horses filter(HeightCm > 150,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Over150cm
Over150cm sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> LargeHorses
